Class Util

    • Method Detail

      • bytesToHex

        public static String bytesToHex​(byte[] bytes)
        Converts a byte array into an hex string representation. This method removes all leading zeroes.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the array to be converted.
        Returns:
        a String containing the byte representation in hexadecimal form.

      • bytesToHex_NoTrim

        private static String bytesToHex_NoTrim​(byte[] bytes)
        Converts a byte array into an hex string representation. This method does not remove any leading zeroes.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the array to be converted.
        Returns:
        a String containing the byte representation in hexadecimal form.

      • isInInterval

        public static boolean isInInterval​(boolean rightBounded,
                                   BigInteger key,
                                   BigInteger leftEndpoint,
                                   BigInteger rightEndpoint,
                                   BigInteger wrapPoint)
        Checks whether a BigInteger is inside an interval, which can belong to a ring (and so wrap around a wrapPoint).
        Parameters:
        rightBounded - a boolean to indicate whether the interval is right-closed
        key - the BigInteger to be checked against the interval
        leftEndpoint - the left endpoint of the interval
        rightEndpoint - the right endpoint of the interval
        wrapPoint - the point where the whole ring wraps around
        Returns:
        true if key is in the interval delimited by leftEndpoint and rightEndpoint

      • truncate

        public static byte[] truncate​(byte[] source,
                              int to_bits)
        Truncates a byte array to a set size. The byte array gets first converted into a hex string, which is truncated and returned back as a byte array using the Apache Commons library.
        Parameters:
        source - The byte array to be truncated
        to_bits - The size (multiple of 4) to truncate
        Returns:
        The truncated byte array
